attributes.action: intervene on behalf of the five HINDRAF human rights activists who have been unconstitutionally arrested and detained under the non-democratic and draconian Internal Security Act by the present Barisan Nasional Government of Malaysia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
